transcript:
Customer: Sir, mujhe ek naya bataya hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir, aap mujhe aadhe ghante ka time denge main aapko office se call karti hu.
Customer: Okay. Thanks ji main se bol rahi hu.
Executive: Main main se dekh raha hai. Haan, theek hai theek hai. Fir aadhe ghante mein main call karti hu.
Customer: Theek hai mam okay.
Executive: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs to know something new.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back from the office in half an hour.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive to call back in half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral to positive.



@@@Key Topics:

call back, time
